channel.title: Protocols :: Intro CS Textbook
channel.description: YouTube Video Resources Slides Video Script The topmost layer of the seven layer OSI network model is the application layer. In this video, weâ€™ll take a look at some application layer protocols and discuss what they do. These protocols are usually used to send data across two different computers using different programs. For example, there are protocols such as pop, SMTP, and eye map for sending and receiving email. We have HTTP and FTP for sending and receiving files and webpages using the World Wide Web.
